overview:
Founder of DeadSocial and Freelancer as Social Media Strategist Ltd.

DeadSocial is a new startups launching at SXSW in March 2012 with the support of UKTI’s Digital Mission.

Registration is now open at http://deadsoci.al

My skillset are largely focused on the following areas:

  • Develop Social Media Strategies
  • Social media analytics
  • Buzz/blog monitoring

  • Viral seeding

  • Mobile internet (MI/WAP)

  • Mobile platforms
  • SMS & MMS marketing
  • Mobile analytics
  • Mobile CMS management

  • Bluetoothing

  • Online marketing

  • Online analysis (Google analytics, Omniture…)
  • SEO (analysis, recommendations, reporting)
  • SEO Link building strategies / activities
  • PPC (analysis, campaign management, reporting)
  • CRM Management
  • Cross platform marketing
  • Developing partnerships
  • Bug testing
  • Account management

milestones.description: Devised and ran the Social Media Experiment at Glastonbury 2010
I was invited to consult the Labour party about the state of the UK technology & Start-Up sector. (Ed Miliband, Ed Balls Ken Livingstone, October 2011)
milestones.source_description: James Norris consulting Ed Miliband & the Labour Party
